t5_summary: bob greene was in the break room when he hears an alarm go off . he says he wasn't sure if it was real emergency or just practice . greene: we have had—we had—so many false alarms recently .
flan_t5_summary: I was in the break room, heating my, my lunch in the microwave, when I hear the alarm go off. At first, I wasn't sure if it was real emergency or just practice.
